title: Carrying when team surrenders.
body:
HOW OFTEN DOES THIS HAPPEN TO YOU?

You are playing with a team who are, let's be honest, complete shit. That doesn't matter though because you are a carry and you are carrying! You, overall are having a great game and having fun too. You might still lose with that scary wombo potential the other team has but hey, you're confident in your abilities and a loss is about 75% expected at this point anyway, might as well have fun. But then you see it, out of the corner of your eye, the surrender vote. One green. No. Two green. _No_. Three green. No, no, no, no NO NO NO NO. FOUR GREEN. GAME OVER. 

I'M FUCKING ON A LEGENDARY SPREE AND THEY PULL THIS SHIT. I guess their sphincters were at their limit and just couldn't take it anymore. Pathetic. 

**TLDR: LET THE CARRY CARRY FFS
**

replies.body: Who the heck are you kid? Do you really expecting people to listen to your 12 year old salt?
